divs: sighting detailsi listen to all of the civil and military aircraft frequencies for ufo reports. for 30 years i have never heard nothing but while driving home to e texas from shreveport la. about a week and a half ago my receiver locked up on 124.575 or 128.575 "will confirm frequency later" and a pilot was talking about "something that was glowing". he told fwc that "about 5 aircraft had reported it on the last frequency". then some pilot made some type of crazy comment that i didnt understand. then a pilot made the " twilight zone" diddle over his mic. i never heard nothing else. im sure that you know how to find this stuff out with the air traffic control centers. im sure it was a dfw controller that was routing high altitude traffic and not a local shreveport la. controller. please let me know what or if you find out anything regarding this matter. im retiring in sept. and will be taking a field investigater course if one is needed in my area. i reside in e texas about 20 miles from shreveport la. but have property about 30 miles n of shreveport near plain dealing la . i am all over e texas and nw la. and would like a large area if possible. im so heavy into ufo's that im designing a type of camera system to watch the skies at all angles plus have a rotateable camera with zoom lens also. my cameras will be recording constantly where i can review the skies at any time. im a ham radio operator and have a dedicated 180 ft tower just for this system. right now im looking at whats available. i also want to purchase a professional cam corder to have with me while traveling. the dept store cameras wont do. im sorry for being late reporting this to you , but im sure theres a log regarding this incident somewhere at dfw . thanks , *wit's name deleted--sgonzalez\cms).
trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Shreveport
There were no other sightings in Shreveport on or around June 12th 2010
Summary: Aircraft reporting UFO to Fort Worth Center ATCC.
